The Five Minute Journal

The Five Minute Journal — I don’t own this journal, but I love the idea of breaking my daily journaling into two sessions: one in the morning and one right before bed; two sessions help enforce perspective. If, like me, you use Day One or write your entries digitally, you can just copy the prompts from the FMJ and fill them in throughout the day.

Published January 6 2015

Enjoy your day.
